CmdLine: apt-get update -qqy &&     apt-get install --no-install-recommends -qqy lsb-release &&         echo "deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu $(lsb_release -sc) main universe" > /etc/apt/sources.list &&     apt-get update -qqy &&     apt-get install -qqy --no-install-recommends libjpeg-progs &&         apt-get remove --purge -y lsb-release $( apt-mark showauto ) &&     apt-get autoremove -y &&     apt-get clean -y &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
